summary: A group of theater actors plays "Hamlet" in a provincial village, faced with their own temptations, disappointments, and joys.
cast: Richard Briers|Hetta Charnley|Joan Collins|Nicholas Farrell|Mark Hadfield|Gerard Horan|Celia Imrie|Michael Maloney|Jennifer Saunders|Julia Sawalha|John Sessions|Ann Davies|James D. White|Robert Hines|Allie Byrne|Adrian Scarborough|Brian Pettifer|Patrick Doyle|Shaun Prendergast|Carol Starks|Edward Jewesbury|Katy Carmichael|Jessica Manley
